name: AeroPods X2
description: Wireless earbuds offering advanced noise cancellation, long battery life, and seamless Bluetooth connectivity for uninterrupted audio experiences.

name: Samsung S23 Ultra
description: Flagship smartphone equipped with a powerful processor, a pro-grade camera system, and the signature S Pen for precise productivity and creativity.

name: DiamondX
description: Luxury smartwatch featuring a diamond-finish bezel, high-resolution OLED display, and exclusive fitness tracking features for a premium lifestyle.

name: BaseWave Pro
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, rugged exterior design, and 12-hour battery life for outdoor music sessions.

name: TurboCharge
description: High-efficiency smartphone charger that supports Quick Charge 4.0 technology for ultra-fast charging on compatible devices.

name: Core Pro X
description: Fitness tracker packed with real-time health metrics, AMOLED screen, and app integration for a complete wellness routine.

name: Melofit
description: Stylish, comfortable earbuds designed for daily use, featuring balanced sound for music lovers and passive noise isolation.

name: Stellafit
description: Elegant smartwatch for modern lifestyles, featuring fitness and sleep tracking with AMOLED visuals and sleek design.

name: TravelBoost

name: DeepSea Pro Watch
description: Engineered for divers, this professional digital watch features a 200m water resistance rating and precision timekeeping.
